org.transitime.ipc.interfaces

Interface ServerStatusInterface

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ServerStatusServer

    public interface ServerStatusInterface
extends java.rmi.Remote
    RMI interface for determining the status of the server.
    Author:
    SkiBu Smith

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IpcServerStatus get()
      Gets from the server a IpcStatus object indicating the status of the server.
      java.lang.String monitor()
      Monitors the agency server for problems.

    • Method Detail

      • get

        IpcServerStatus get()
             throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Gets from the server a IpcStatus object indicating the status of the server.
        Returns:
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • monitor

        java.lang.String monitor()
                  throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Monitors the agency server for problems. If there is a problem then a message indicating such is returned. Sending out notifications is done by the server side.
        Returns:
        Error message if there is one, otherwise null
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException
